munit:test.name: processOrders_returns2ElementMap
munit:test.description: Calling processOrders returns two element map

munit:assert-true.message: The payload is not of the expected type java.util.Map.
munit:assert-true.doc:name: Assert True

munit:assert-on-equals.message: The total items in the payload (type java.util.Map) is not equal to 2.
munit:assert-on-equals.doc:name: Assert Equals

munit:test.name: processOrders_internationalKeyReturnsInternationalOrders
munit:test.description: The value of the map key international contains only international orders

munit:assert-true.message: The payload does not contain two 'international' items.
munit:assert-true.doc:name: Assert True

munit:assert-on-equals.doc:name: Assert Equals
munit:assert-on-equals.message: #['The order at position ' + flowVars.counter + ' is not an international order.']

munit:test.name: processOrders_domesticKeyReturnsDomesticOrders
munit:test.description: The value of the map key domestic contains only domestic orders

munit:assert-true.message: The payload does not contain two 'domestic' items.
munit:assert-true.doc:name: Assert True

munit:assert-on-equals.doc:name: Assert Equals
munit:assert-on-equals.message: #['The order at position ' + flowVars.counter + ' is not an domestic order.']
